Well, they're a metal band with a Parrot as a lead singer. Click the link, find hatebeak and listen away: urlLink HATEBEAK!

and its funny! it's one of them channel 4 adverts where people say what makes them feel guilty, what their fave food is, but this one is slightly different, they asked them their fave swear word! warning! contains LOADS OF SWEARING, so if you don't like that kind of gutter speak or you mother would blush if she heard that kind of thing don't click urlLink HERE once you've clicked on there click on the view movie bit! :) otherwise click there and laugh!

right then back again I am. couple of interesting little bits and pieces to pop up on here, that I've noticed / found over the last few days. It's KITT for sale on urlLink Ebay and then there's Magnum's car from Magnum P.I urlLink for sale as well! Also, have you seen the 'Preparing for Emergencies' booklet the government has been sending out? well it's supposed to give handy advice on how to prepare for an emergency. They even made a website for it. Click urlLink here to see the real deal. However, some bright spark out there thought it would be good fun to make a spoof version, so they did, and it's ace! Click urlLink here to see this one, much more entertaining. anyway I'm off to listen to This : Modest Mouse's new album called 'Good New for people who like bad news' Coz it's a great album, sounds like Tom Waits in bits, which can never be a bad thing in my books! :)

Right re-cap of last night, went to anna and dave's drank nearly 2 bottles of wine and got a little drunk, whoops. Just got the new Hives album through the post, sounds good already, 30 minutes and 1 second long in total. anyway, check this:

Ah right oh couple of bits of news. Got a new job, am now a Knowledge Base Author, which is nice. Went over to the Village Pump festival last night with my dad and my uncle tis a great night out. Here's a couple of photos to show what it's like: and as always at places like this it's all about the beer: Saw a great punk covers band called God Save The Queen, well worth checking out if you get the chance. They even did Smash It Up (parts 1 and 2) by the Damned :) I guess because of that I can forgive them for doing a cover of 'All The Small Things' ah well I guess you can't always get what you want. Here's a photo I took of them: and here's a couple more but of the lead singer, as these ones came out quite well: well that's all, until next time people.

I'm guessing you'll be reading this a little time after I write it as I haven't launch the new site yet but I figured I probably needed a few bits here and there ready like. Well last Friday was the last night of The Pig at the old place, it certainly was emtional and I'm sure those of you who were there had a hell of time, god knows I did! :) anyway as most of you know I work for Virgin Mobile. After much deliberation it seems they've decided to launch on the stock market, and have given me some free shares! YAY! anyway thought it best to pop a link in so I can track their progress, so I can keep checking how much or how little they're worth! urlLink Track them shares and as a memorial to the pig I give you this:

Hello and welcome to me new news page! You Like? I do hope so. Got me customised menu on the side there and everything and because this is a blogger account you should find I'll update things more regularly as well, which is always a bonus! :) Plus I now know how to post piccies and everything up on here so I'll be doing that as well, which is always a bonus! Plus if you have a song that you think I need to hear or a picture I should see, when use the link up the top there, near the title to mail it to me as that one links to me Gmail acccount, with mucho storage space. anyway I'll shut up now and leave you with this:

Hello. Sorry back of news recently but I've been busy, yes that's right me busy. Firstly been in Slough for most of the last 2 weeks doing training for me new job with these guys, try the Egain assistant on the site (Click here to get straight to it) and ask her silly questions like what's you favourite film or what's her favourite position, some of the re-actions are amusing. Well was me birthday last weekend and it seems much fun was had by all concerned. Here's a selection of the photos: Yes that is me up there in a feather boa, with Anna, although I dunno I think it suits PT and Dan Better! ;P

urlLink people swearing (lots)! Don't thin buggeration has ever sounded so scary! anyway tonight is the first night of the new pig am really rather looking forward it you know! Will put a photo or three up here as and when I can, but it is my birthday on sunday and then I'm away for basically the entire following week on training so it could be a short while before they appear, anyway I shall leave you in peace for now.
